summary: Diff implements a premium dark cyberpunk UI refresh with updated logo/banner references, improved typography/contrast, and broader glass/neon styling across sections. One key uncertainty is whether the actual new image assets were added under the required public path (no new files shown). Diff also introduces some UX behaviors (search/filter + localStorage persistence/reset) not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the current site logo and banner with new premium versions and update the UI to use the new asset filenames; all asset references point to files under frontend/public/assets/generated and load correctly (no broken images).
missing_requirements.reason: The code references the new premium asset filenames, but the diff shows no added/changed files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the actual asset replacement cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Persisting last selected panel/duration in localStorage and adding a reset that clears both keys.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on UI refresh/readability/assets/theme consistency and explicitly preserving the purchase flow behavior; persistence/reset behavior is not requested in the requirements/AC.

hallucinated_features.description: Adding panels search and duration filtering controls in the Panels section.
hallucinated_features.reason: Search/filter UI is not part of REQ-41..REQ-44 and is not mentioned as a requirement; it is an unrequested functional enhancement.
